entry.title: WEATHER ADVISORY , New Tecumseth
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 4:12 PM EST Sunday 25 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: -7.1°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Egbert 9:00 PM EST Sunday 25 December 2022
Temperature: -7.1°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.0 kPa rising
Humidity: 75 %
Wind Chill: -15
Dewpoint: -10.8°C
Wind: WSW 22 km/h gust 36 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Sunday night: Flurries. Low minus 8.
entry.summary: Flurries ending near midnight then mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Local blowing snow early this evening. Local amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 8. Wind chill near minus 14. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Sunday 25 December 2022

entry.title: Monday: Mainly cloudy. Temperature steady near minus 6.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light late in the afternoon. Temperature steady near minus 6. Wind chill minus 15 in the morning and minus 10 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Sunday 25 December 2022

entry.title: Monday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 8.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming light early in the evening. Low minus 8. Wind chill near minus 14. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Sunday 25 December 2022
